query: SELECT p.cid AS cid, pt.hn AS hn, p.pname AS title_code, p.fname AS first_name, NULL AS middle_name, p.lname AS last_name, p.birthdate AS birthdate, p.sex AS gender, p.bloodgroup_rh AS rh_blood_group, p.blood_group AS blood_group, p.nationality AS nationality_code, p.marrystatus AS marital_status FROM person AS p JOIN patient pt ON pt.cid = p.cid where pt.hn in (#hn)
